Add self-contained Sentry CLI with bootstrap mode

- Created sentry_cli.py as standalone uv script with inline dependencies
- Added bootstrap flow that checks for config at ~/.sentry-script/config.json

- All CLI commands gated behind bootstrap check
- Hardcoded org-slug to "square-inc"
- Script can be run directly from GitHub with: uv run https://github.com/...
